comment: Vaguest schedule that I've ever seen. each week had one-word description, some tba. Gives handouts, expects work on new material or existing material before every class (a lot of hw). Walked out class within 15 mins bc class was shy on a Monday. As many theatre classes, not any grades. Ruined my GPA (expected 4.0) gave 89. Never absent & communicat
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Tough grader
